text: Ser-Od-Yanjiviin Gankhuyag (born 6 September 1994) is a Mongolian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Mongolian Premier League club Khangarid and the Mongolian national team. ==Club career== Gankhuyag has played for the Khangarid FC since 2013. ==International career== Gankhuyag made his senior international debut on 3 November 2016 in a 2016 AFC Solidarity Cup match against Macau. He also competed with the under-23 team at the 2017 Aceh World Solidarity Tsunami Cup. ===International goals=== Score and result list Mongolia's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! # !!
